articles.content: Mahindra & Mahindra has offlated 6.05% equity representing 2,28,80,000 shares in its associate company Mahindra CIE Automotive through a block deal on Monday.The company sold shares at a gross pr… [+1994 chars]

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Indian state refiners to produce 30,800 tonne/yr green hydrogen by 2030 - Economic Times
articles.description: ​​The federal government has announced it would provide 300 billion rupees ($3.65 billion) to help state-run oil refiners move towards cleaner energy, a step aimed at helping the country achieve its 2070 net-zero carbon emission target.
articles.content: Indian state-run refiners are setting up projects to produce 30.8 kilo tonnes a year of green hydrogen by 2030, junior oil minister Rameswar Teli told lawmakers on Monday. India, one of the world's b… [+1454 chars]
